commandobject.name: SetWalk
commandobject.documentation: Set whether you are walking or running (default is run).

property.name: Walk
property.documentation: True or false to enable/disable bot walking.

property.name: WalkAnim
property.documentation: Change name of walking animation. Supported in UE2.

property.name: RunAnim
property.documentation: Change name of running animation. Supported in UE2
